properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 7 at 4:01AM AKST until February 9 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Plan on difficult
travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches,
with localized amounts up to 12 inches, are possible.

* WHERE..North of Hughes.

* WHEN...From Saturday morning through Sunday afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant
snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue
to monitor the latest forecasts.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
